text:
@NBCNews Nearly 10,000 Americans - equivalent to three 911's - have died from #Covid19 in the last *two weeks*. Yet Trump's new message is "live with it". 

By comparison, CDC estimates that average American deaths from seasonal flu are 60K, or ~2308 every 2 weeks. Covid19 is 4x this.
